title: CS 320 lecture
body: hey guys, I was just curious if anybody had taken 320 semi-recently, I was wondering if lectures would be recorded? I know there's group projects so it's probably important to attend lectures to meet with people (?) but does anybody know anything?
comments: There's videos on his youtube page, and the lectures are important but projects are more important. Group work is expected to be done outside of class
If you have it with Tyler he records all the lectures. You meet with your group outside of class too

I also wonder how do we find our group members? 
Will we have to find by ourselves, or professor will assign?
Thanks!
